custom_steps:

1. User finds a Split Double Header Game in batter.
a. See attached Change Memo #39 7/24 CIN ATL Game as an example 

2. Batter shows an option to â€œShow Current Broadcasterâ€� option (checkbox?) where we are able to show the other DH game (which may not have been changed). 

3. User can show both game 1 and 2 in the change

title: Change Memo || Search Changes - Updates to Layout from Stakeholders
custom_steps:
As a member of the Broadcast team, I want to edit some aesthetic aspects of the Change Memo, so that it's more in line with the process Im used to.




![](index.php?/attachments/get/14851958)

title: Receive Change Memo Email
custom_steps:
Predecessor: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/STT-1914]

1. The recipients of the Change Memo will receive an email notification. 
Contents:
- From: (?) what email would it come from? 
- Details will be as shown in [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/STT-1914]
- This email will be for outgoing email only. Recipients cannot reply to the email. Instead they will get an error message that it's for outgoing email only.

title: Create change memo email template / templates
custom_steps:
Mock-up: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/65eb5dbe5cb600e220e9e6d2] 
Predecessor: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/STT-1913]


1. User clicks *select template*. A screen shows with available templates to choose from. 

2. Subject line is auto populated based on the template chosen
a. User can adjust/modify the body based on needs. It cannot be blank. 

3. Body will auto populate based on template
a. User can adjust/modify the body based on needs.  It cannot be blank. 

4. User can see the data that will populate in the change memo list *(user cannot modify these change details from this screen, they would have to go to Batter to update them such as comments)* 

5. Footer will auto populate 
a. Editing the footer like 2a and 3a is not needed as it's not common. 

6. User can choose to *Release Immediately* or *Schedule Release* 

Out of scope: 
1. User cannot choose what fields to show on the email template. It's configured in the back-end.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14851959)

title: Release Change Memo | Change Memo
custom_steps:
Predecessor: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/STT-1982]

Mock-up: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/65eb5dbed6b25a6e18aeb4d6] 


1. User goes to Change Memo > Memo History Tab. Default is current year 2024 for the year filter. 
2. Any Change Memo Scheduled or Released would display 
3. User will click on *Release* button. A confirmation box will appear in green with *Released*. User can click x to close that dialogue box. 
4. User can click *Resend* to re-send a memo already released. 
5. User can click Cancel instead of Release/ Resend 
6. The Memo # is hyperlinked allowing user to update the details per [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/STT-1982]

title: Change Memo || Change Types Filter - Default Filter to 'Broadcast'
custom_steps:
As a member of the Broadcast team, I want to filter predominantly by Broadcasts in the Change Memo, so that I can find my changes more easily. 


1. *Broadcast* displays as default for the *Change Type* filter.

title: Edit Broadcast comments in Change memo updates Batter
custom_steps:
Edit Broadcast comments in Change memo updates Batter


1. User goes to Edit Broadcast comments and updates data
2. The updates go back to batter

NOTE: WE need to understand more of the scenarios and types of changes from Dewey. 

This is also low priority for phase 1. 



![](index.php?/attachments/get/14851969)

title: Schedule a Change Memo Release
custom_steps:
Predecessor: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/STT-1911] 
Mock-up: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/65eb5dbc37128ce54cb54a60] 


1. User can schedule when to send the email in the future by selecting a date and time. It will be in Eastern time. 
2. User can click *Release Now* and it will allow user to release. See [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/STT-1913] for what happens next after Release Now. 
3. Pick a date from a calendar picker and time in ET.
4. User can Remove the date and start all over again.
5. User can click on *Tomorrow* and tomorrow's date will auto populate
6. User can pick Monday and the Monday following will auto populate 
7. User selects *Schedule* button or *Cancel*

title: Select change memo recipients | Change Memo
custom_steps:
Mock-up: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/65eb5dbcc77ee0b0587020dd

1. User can choose who to send the change memo to from a distribution list or decide send to an individual email address 
2. User selects one or many distribution lists 
3. User can click on Add Recipient to add more emails 
4. User can remove emails (see sample screenshot below) or remove the distribution list in total by using a trashcan icon 
5. User can Click “Create Memo” button

title: Create Change Memo | Display who the national broadcaster is
custom_steps:
1. Search for a change for a local broadcaster. For example, search for 8/7 SD @ PIT game as seen in the screenshot below. 
2. Display in Batter who the local broadcaster is, ex: SDPA, SAP, SNP, etc inside of ( ) 
   - Currently shows SD, add FS1 AND PIT, add FS1
   - Change to: SD (SDPA, SAP), add FS1 AND PIT (SNP), add FS1
3. Display all the national braodcasters and dewey can edit it

title: View Change Memo Summary Screen | Change Memo
custom_steps:
Mock-up: https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/65eb5dbcc77ee0b0587020dd


1. User will go to “Change Memo” screen and filter the games in scope. The screen will show these options/fields: 

    a. Checkbox for selecting multiple / all
    b. Date: ex Mon, 3/18/24  do we need the year? 
    c. Day: Day of the week. ex. Fri, Sat, Tue, Thu, Sat, etc 
    d. Team: Ex TOR, ATL, PIT
    e. Change type: Game or Broadcast 
    f. Details:  from “broadcast comments”  field. 
    g. Memo #
    h. Broadcaster  
    i. Status 
    j. “Create Memo” button

title: Filter | Change Memo
custom_steps:
Mock-up: 

https://app.zeplin.io/project/5a0f1d4f4dcff4ca30221618/screen/65eb5dbcc77ee0b0587020dd


1. The “Change Memo” screen will mirror what we have for “Out of Market Request” page for layout 
2. The filters needed for this page will be:
     - Start Date: DD/MM/YYYY default to current season start date in Batter 
     - End Date: DD/MM/YYYY default to current season end date in Batter
     - Broadcast Type: 
     - Range Checkbox: allows users to pick a single date. Unclicking range will show the date range picker. Default is range is checked. 
     - Status: Default to “Unreleased”. Other status are: Released, Scheduled
     - Teams: Default to All. Multi select value. 
     - Sports: Default to MLB.
     - Broadcaster: Default to All. Multi select value. 
3. If no results match the filters a message will appear “No requests for the given filters” 
4. If there are results matching, it will display below the filters 
5. User can change any of the filters. When the filters are changed, the screen will refresh automatically

title: Permissions | Change Memo
custom_steps: 1. The “Change Memo” page in Batter will only be accessible from Admin and Broadcast Users

title: Create a new tab called "Change Memo" | Change Memo
custom_steps:

2. The "Change Memo" tab will appear on the top level navigation between Non-Baseball Events and Admin

title: Dewey || Game Change Memo - Display Relevant Broadcast Comments in GCM
custom_steps:
1. New change type is created: Notes.

2. Broadcast Comments associated with either game in the line item display in the Change in Schedule or Broadcast Coverage column.
a. Type of change is “Notes”.
b. “Notes” displays in Type column in line item of Broadcast Comment.
c. Broadcast Comment that displays is most up-to-date Broadcast Comment.

3. Broadcast comments wrap to fit within the cell.
